meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix
meanings.meaning: 2. place どっちが最終的な安息の地となるんだろう。Which one will be our final resting place?

1. ground; land; earth; soil 雨降って地固まる。Adversity strengthens the foundations.
2. the region in question; the local area
3. skin
4. texture; fabric; material; weave 彼女のドレスは青い地に白の水玉模様がある。Her dress has white spots on a blue background.
5. base; background
6. one's true nature
7. narrative (i.e. descriptive part of a story)
8. real life; actuality
9. captured territory Go (game)
10. noh chorus See also 地謡
11. accompaniment music (in Japanese dance)
12. basic phrase (in Japanese music; usu. repetitive)
13. base part (of multiple shamisens)

sentences.translation: Which one will be our final resting place?
European civilization had its birth in these lands.

1. district; region; area; locality 彼は今年の夏、東北地方を旅行した。He traveled through the Tohoku district this summer.

meanings.meaning: 1. (social) position; status; standing 高級車は地位の象徴である。An expensive car is a status symbol.
2. position (in a company, organization, etc.); post; rank 彼は会社で高い地位にあります。He holds a high position at the company.
